${ModID}:Clownfish.NAME: Clownfish
${ModID}:Clownfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Guppy.NAME: Guppy
${ModID}:Guppy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hammerhead.NAME: Hammerhead
${ModID}:Hammerhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Orca.NAME: Orca
${ModID}:Orca.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Orca.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Piranha.NAME: Piranha
${ModID}:Piranha.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Qwilfish.NAME: Qwilfish
${ModID}:Qwilfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SeaMonster.NAME: Sea Monster
${ModID}:SeaMonster.DESCRIPTION: Add 3 random Attacks into your hand. They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SeaMonster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 3 random Upgraded Attacks into your hand. They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Shark.NAME: Shark
${ModID}:Shark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Siren.NAME: Siren
${ModID}:Siren.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hook.NAME: Hook
${ModID}:Hook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.NAME: Catch of the Day
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Baited.NAME: Baited
${ModID}:Baited.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a ${ModID}:Fish into your hand. NL If the enemy intends to attack, add !M! more.

${ModID}:GoneFishing.NAME: Gone Fishing
${ModID}:GoneFishing.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CarryOn.NAME: Carry On
${ModID}:CarryOn.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 Cards. Draw an extra card next turn.
${ModID}:CarryOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 Cards. Draw 2 extra cards next turn.

${ModID}:EmergencyFireworks.NAME: Emergency Fireworks
${ModID}:EmergencyFireworks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. When discarded, apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak to ALL enemies.
